name: Marilyn Monroe
description:
Appreciate my work? Can you buy me a coffe please :)

Marilyn Monroe: born as Norma Jeane Mortenson; Los Angeles, June 1, 1926-Los Angeles, August 4, 1962) was an American actress, singer, and model. Famous for playing "blonde bombshell" comedic personas, she became one of the most popular sex symbols of the 1950s and early 1960s, as well as an emblem of the sexual revolution of the time. one of the most sought-after actresses for a decade, and her films grossed $200 million (equivalent to $2 billion in 2021) by the time of her death in 1962.6 Long after her passing, Monroe remains a major cultural icon pop.7 In 1999, the American Film Institute ranked her sixth on its list of the greatest female film legends of Hollywood's Golden Age.8 Various film critics and the media have cited Monroe as one of the best actors who never received an Oscar nomination.

Used model: Realistic Vision v1,3

recommended parameters:

Prompt:

RAW photo, a close up portrait photo of 26 y.o woman in wastelander clothes, long haircut, pale skin, slim body, background is city ruins, (high detailed skin:1.2), 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3

Negative Prompt:
(deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch, cartoon, drawing, anime:1.4), text, close up, cropped, out of frame, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck


DPM++ 2S a Karras with 25 steps
CFG Scale 7

QR to my page buymeacoffee
